reporting-org.narrative: East and Horn of Africa Human Rights Defenders Project (DefendDefenders)

title.narrative: Building capacity for human rights defenders to continue engaging in human rights work safely and securely

description.narrative: Organising and delivering trainings and capacity building for human rights defenders at risk. The aim is tor strengthen their capacity and resilience to continue engaging in their human rights work. Trainings included: Training of trainers in physical security; Regional Training of trainers on Digital Security with Curriculum; Training of trainers in organisational digital security auditing (SAFETAG); Training on physical and digital safety; and Expanded and improved DocIT incubator for electronic documentation, communications and advocacy.
